title: Add More option
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: More Menu configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "more_menu_config" as needed to force display. 
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform/target_audience)


GIVEN Ballpark app is installed
custom_expected: THEN newly added configurations should be displayed correctly in More tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the more_menu_config has added the below struct with config updated and published:
 {
      "title": "SteveO TestLink1",
      "imageSvgUrl": "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconAboutBallpark.svg",
      "imagePngUrl": "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconAboutBallpark.png",
      "deepLinkUrl": "ballpark://mlb-account"
    },
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user sees an additional option in the More menu with the the image icon of ballpark, the title of "SteveO TestLink1" and tapping the title takes the user to My MLB Account Emails.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the more_menu_config has added the below struct with config updated and published:
 {
      "title": "SteveO TestLink2 - extended text ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWYXZ0123456789!@#$%^&*()",
      "imageSvgUrl": "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconAboutBallpark.svg",
      "imagePngUrl": "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconAboutBallpark.png",
      "deepLinkUrl": "ballpark://mlb-account"
    },
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user sees an additional option in the More menu with the the image icon of ballpark, the title of "SteveO TestLink2 - extended text ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWYXZ0123456789!@#$%^&*()" in its entirety spanning across multiple lines, and tapping the title takes the user to My MLB Account Emails.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the more_menu_config has added the below struct with config updated and published:
    {
      "title": "SteveO TestLink3 - empty imgIcon",
      "imageSvgUrl": "",
      "imagePngUrl": "",
      "deepLinkUrl": "ballpark://mlb-account"
    },

NOTES: 
* imageSvgUrl is an Android configuration / imagePngUrl is iOS configuration
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user sees an additional option in the More menu with no image icon, the title of "SteveO TestLink3 - empty imgIcon" and tapping the title takes the user to My MLB Account Emails.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the more_menu_config has added the below struct with config updated and published:
    {
      "title": "SteveO TestLink4 - empty deeplink",
      "imageSvgUrl": "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconAboutBallpark.svg",
      "imagePngUrl": "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconAboutBallpark.png",
      "deepLinkUrl": ""
    },
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user sees an additional option in the More menu with the the image icon of ballpark, the title of "SteveO TestLink4 - empty deeplink" and tapping on the title does not have an effect.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the more_menu_config has added the below struct with config updated and published:
    {
      "title": "SteveO TestLink4a - outbound link",
      "imageSvgUrl": "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconAboutBallpark.svg",
      "imagePngUrl": "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconAboutBallpark.png",
      "deepLinkUrl": "https://google.com"
    },
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user sees an additional option in the More menu with the the image icon of ballpark, the title of "SteveO TestLink4a - outbound link" and tapping on the title opens a web browser to google.com

custom_steps_separated.content:
(repeat below as many times necessary to cause additional links to not be shown on initial load and requires scrolling)
WHEN the more_menu_config has added the below struct with config updated and published:
    {
      "title": "SteveO TestLink5x",
      "imageSvgUrl": "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconAboutBallpark.svg",
      "imagePngUrl": "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconAboutBallpark.png",
     "deepLinkUrl": "ballpark://mlb-account"
    },
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user sees an additional option(s) in the More menu with the the image icon of ballpark, the title of "SteveO TestLink5x" and tapping the title of each takes the user to My MLB Account Emails. 

THEN (depending on phone size) the user may not see all links upon load 
AND the user scrolls down/up to show additional options, without removing any prev established.

title: Update More option
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: More Menu configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "more_menu_config" as needed to force display. 
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform)


GIVEN Ballpark app is installed
custom_expected: THEN newly updated configurations should be displayed correctly in More tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the more_menu_config has a menu option "title" updated to "UPDATED more TITLE"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user sees the updated menu option with the title "UPDATED more TITLE" in the More menu option
AND the image icon remains the same and tapping the title takes the user to same location as previously set.

custom_steps_separated.content:
(ANDROID) WHEN the more_menu_config has a menu option imageSvgUrl updated to  "https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/o/app-assets%2Fmore-menu%2FIconCamera.svg?alt=media&token=68c8cd12-f1ca-43b0-bc24-d16db9db59b4"


(iOS) WHEN the more_menu_config has a menu option imagePngUrl updated to "https://storage.googleapis.com/mlb-ballpark-app-831.appspot.com/app-assets/more-menu/IconCamera%403x.png",
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user sees the updated menu option with the Camera icon image
AND the title remains the same and tapping the title takes the user to same location as previously set.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the more_menu_config has a menu option deepLinkUrl updated to "https://www.mlb.com"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user sees the same title and img icon 
BUT tapping the title takes the user to external site https://www.mlb.com.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the more_menu_config has a menu option deepLinkUrl updated to "ballpark://mlb-account"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user sees the same title and img icon 
BUT tapping the title takes the user to My MLB Account Emails.

title: Remove More option
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: More Menu configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "more_menu_config" as needed to force display. 
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform)


GIVEN Ballpark app is installed
custom_expected: THEN desired menu configurations should no longer be displayed in More tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the more_menu_config has a struct removed AND with config updated and published.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user no longer sees the removed option in the More menu with the the image icon and title no longer shown.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the more_menu_config has a struct removed that was placed in between others(or first) AND with config updated and published.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user no longer sees the removed option in the More menu with the the image icon and title no longer shown.
AND no gap is shown where the removed option was shown formerly

title: Customer Support
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account
AND user taps on More bottom nav bar tab
AND Customer Support menu option in remote config is external link type ("https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/help-center/contact-us")

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Customer Support menu option on the More page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Customer Support view is shown within the device browser (external to BP)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user returns to More page in BP app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Customer Support page is dismissed and user is show the More page

title: FAQs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account
AND user taps on More bottom nav bar tab
AND FAQ menu option in remote config is "ballpark://webview..." type

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on FAQs menu option on the More page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN FAQs view is shown with Close/'X' and refresh icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on refresh icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN FAQs page remains open and page is refreshed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Close/'X'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN FAQs page is closed
AND user is returned to More page

title: Take Our Survey[DEPRECATED]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account
AND user taps on More bottom nav bar tab
AND Take Our Survey menu option in remote config is "ballpark://webview..." type

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Take Our Survey menu option on the More page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Take Our Survey view is shown with refresh icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on refresh icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Take Our Survey page remains open and page is refreshed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user desires to return to Ballpark app 
[Android user] Utilizes the system back navigation
[iOS user] Either closes the web browser or app switches
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to More page

title: [iOS ONLY] Do Not Sell or Share My Data [Hard coded entry]
custom_preconds:
[BP-10771](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10771 )

GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (13.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account
AND user taps on More bottom nav bar tab
custom_expected:
THEN 'Do Not Sell or Share My Data' w/ 'This does not override Apple's Do Not Track Settings' subtext shown below 'Do Not Sell or Share My Data'
[BP-10771](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10771 )
AND 'Do Not Sell' entry is above About Ballpark

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Do Not Sell or Share My Data' menu option on the More page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Privacy Portal page is shown in an external browser

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user returns to Ballpark App
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN browser page is backgrounded
AND user is returned to More page

title: About Ballpark [Hard coded entry]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (13.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account
AND user taps on More bottom nav bar tab
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on More bottom nav bar tab
custom_expected: THEN 'About Ballpark' is shown with an icon as a menu option

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'About Ballpark'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN app displays a new page with 'About' as title
AND the Menu options (About Ballpark, Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, Do Not Sell or Share My Data*

AND Android user is shown 'QA Tools' on Debug type builds
OR iOS user is shown 'Developer Tools' menu option on Debug type builds

*[iOS only] 'This does not override Apple's Do Not Track Settings' subtext shown below 'Do Not Sell or Share My Data [BP-10771](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10771 )

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'About Ballpark' within About menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the read-only items are shown such as version, device, build, network, email, and ID

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps back navigation
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to About page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Terms of Use' within About menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN webview of Terms of Use is shown with Close/'X' and refresh icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on refresh icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Terms of Use page remains open and page is refreshed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Close/'X'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Terms of Use page is closed
AND user is returned to About page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Privacy Policy' within About menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN webview of Privacy Policy is shown with Close/'X' and refresh icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on refresh icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Privacy Policy page remains open and page is refreshed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Close/'X'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Privacy Policy page is closed
AND user is returned to About page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user taps 'Do Not Sell or Share My Data' within About menu

*[iOS only] 'This does not override Apple's Do Not Track Settings' subtext shown below 'Do Not Sell or Share My Data [BP-10771](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10771 )
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN webview of Do Not Sell My Data is shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on refresh icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Do Not Sell My Data page remains open and page is refreshed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Close/'X'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Do Not Sell My Data page is closed
AND user is returned to About page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user back navigates from 'About' page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken back to 'More' page

title: Photo Creator [DEPRECATED w/ 10.6.0]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account
AND user taps on More bottom nav bar tab

NOTE: When testing Android, do NOT user QA Env/Build.  QA builds will crash if user tries to access Camera.
custom_steps: WHEN accessing Photo Creator on the More page
custom_expected: THEN Camera view is opened allowing user to create photos/videos, including snapchat lenses (if applicable)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Photo Creator menu option on the More page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN camera view is opened

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'X' to dismiss the camera view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to More page

title: Loyalty Programs [DEPRECATED w/ 11.1.0]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account
AND user taps on More bottom nav bar tab
custom_steps: WHEN accessing Loyalty Programs on the More page
custom_expected: THEN Loyalty Programs page is displayed allowing user to select desired Club Loyalty Program

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Loyalty Programs menu option on the More page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Loyalty Programs page is displayed with available loyalty programs for the clubs listed

custom_steps_separated.content: (iOS) WHEN user taps on the the "Done" button in the top right corner
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to More page

custom_steps_separated.content: (Android) WHEN user taps on the back button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to More page

title: Close MLB Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account
AND user taps on More bottom nav bar tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Close MLB Account menu option on the More page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Close MLB Account view is shown within the internal BP app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user Close on top left corner
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Close MLB Account page is dismissed and user is show the More Page

title: [iOS] Deeplink - More > About > About Ballpark
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Ballpark app is open
AND user is logged in
AND user has favorite team(s) set
AND user accesses ballpark://about deeplink
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to About Ballpark modal with 'Done' link shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Done' on the About Ballpark modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to Home page
AND the user's first selected fave team is shown on the TeamTab with Team logo/name
AND Home tab is highlighted in the bottom navigation bar

title: [iOS] Deeplink - More > Photo Creator [DEPRECATED w/ 10.6.0]
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
custom_steps: WHEN I click a link outside the Ballpark app that is supposed to open More>Photo Creator in the Ballpark app
custom_expected: THEN I want to be taken to the desired page in the app.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Ballpark app is not open
AND user is logged out
AND user accesses ballpark://camera deeplink
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to login prompt

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user logs in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to Camera page
AND iOS prompt to 'Don't Allow / OK' Ballpark access to the camera (if initial time allowing)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'X' to dismiss Camera
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to Home page
AND Home tab is highlighted in the bottom navigation bar

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Ballpark app is not open
AND user is logged in
AND user accesses ballpark://camera deeplink
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to Camera page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'X' to dismiss Camera
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to Home page
AND Home tab is highlighted in the bottom navigation bar

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Ballpark app is open
AND user is logged out
AND user accesses ballpark://camera deeplink
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to login prompt

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user logs in
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to Camera page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'X' to dismiss Camera
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to Home page
AND Home tab is highlighted in the bottom navigation bar

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Ballpark app is open
AND user is logged in
AND user has favorite team(s) set
AND user accesses ballpark://camera deeplink
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to Camera page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'X' to dismiss Camera
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to Home page
AND the user's first selected team card with Team logo, name, Park info button is shown on Home page
AND 'You might be interested in ...' with upcoming games carousel is shown
AND Home tab is highlighted in the bottom navigation bar
